record.name: Men's Original Bootcut Jeans - Blue Denim
record.formattedName: Men's Original Bootcut Jeans - Blue Denim
record.description: Original Bootcut Jeans are made with our most durable, heavy-weight denim to ensure a comfortable ride. The wide bootleg opening easily fits your riding boots.

record.name: Men's Classic Bootcut Jeans - Washed Blue
record.formattedName: Men's Classic Bootcut Jeans - Washed Blue
record.description: Classic Bootcut Jeans are constructed with durable cotton denim and have traditional 5-pocket styling. The jeans are made with a modern finish that incorporates distressed detailing. The wide bootcut silhouette fits nicely over your riding boots.

record.name: Ultra M04 Half Helmet
record.description: For an open feel on the open road, consider the Ultra M04 Half Helmet. This design, like all half helmets, delivers minimal coverage and weight, but still passes tough DOT standards. Stay cool with the moisture-wicking liner and cut glare on a gorgeous sun-soaked day with the removable visor. Bold art inspired by classic tank colors and graphics gives this men's motorcycle half helmet icon style.

record.name: Wheeler M04 Half Helmet
record.description: Fit, style, and comfort. Have it all in our matte black Wheeler M04 Half Helmet. Designed with a removable visor to help combat sun glare, this motorcycle half helmet features an exclusive shell design you won't find anywhere but here. You'll love how the colorful flame artwork contrasts with the sleek matte black shell. Great look; huge value at an exceptional price point.

record.name: Pink Label M04 Half Helmet
record.description: The Pink Label M04 Half Helmet is for every free spirit, friend, or family member impacted by breast cancer. Expert details include tonal embroidery and a metal badge of the iconic pink ribbon on the earflaps. A bold black-white-pink color scheme coordinates with other Pink Label gear or your favorite black leather wardrobe. This design, like all half helmets, delivers minimal coverage and weight, but still passes tough DOT standards. Stay cool with the moisture-wicking liner and cut glare on a gorgeous sun-soaked day with the removable visor on this women's motorcycle half helmet. For every Pink Label product purchased, Harley-Davidson® will donate 3% of net sales to organizations who support and empower those facing breast cancer.
